title: Maria Marten, or the Murder in the Red Barn

sources.title: Murder in the Red Barn (1935)
sources.description: Tod Slaughter has eyes for pretty Maria Marten, but when she spurns him he's not happy at all.

metadata.Plot: In 1820s rural England, a young girl is tricked by a villainous Squire's promises of marriage, and when she becomes pregnant and disappears, a gypsy lad is blamed.
metadata.Actors: Tod Slaughter, Sophie Stewart, D.J. Williams
